attributes.additional_details:
It doesn't not make sense, that, pubs and bars are allowed to open, but not gym facilities. 
 People are allowed to go to pubs, get drunk, weaken their immune system and get weaker to fight covid 19. Yet us, who want to go the gym, and get healthier, and fitter and strengthen our immune system, to fight covid 19 are being ignored. 
 People in bars don't wear face masks, but we don't care, we are happy to wear face masks and sanitize everything we touch, just let us go and do what we love. THANKS
attributes.background: We want the government to reopen gym facilities in England immediately.

rejection.details: Since you started your petition gyms have been allowed to reopen. You can read the Government's announcement about the reopening of gyms here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-announces-gyms-and-pools-to-reopen-safely
